I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to walk at least #{initialHealthGoal} meters on #{selected_days} starting from today until #{auto_destruct}, between #{time_range}.

Each time I successfully complete my distance goal, I will increase my next goal by #{incrementHealthGoalBy} meters, continuing this pattern until I reach my final goal of #{finalHealthGoal} meters per day.

If I miss a day, the distance does not increase, and I will retry the same goal next time.

This is my promise to myself — to stay active, build momentum, and walk my way toward better health. 🚶‍♀️🔥

basicQuest.title: Daily Distance Walk
basicQuest.instructions:
Your body is your **vehicle**, and walking is how you **tune it up** — meter by meter, day by day. When you walk, you're not just moving your legs, you're moving your life forward. Here's how you do it:

### 🚶‍♂️ What to Do:

* **Start with your goal.** Today's target is #{initialHealthGoal} meters — and that number will rise with every win.
* **Break it into chunks.** Morning walk, post-lunch stroll, evening loop. No pressure to do it all at once.
* **Stay consistent.** Even if it rains or you're tired, show up. Every meter counts.
* **Stretch before and after.** Loosen up your joints, protect your engine.
* **Breathe deep as you walk.** In through the nose, out through the mouth. Let your thoughts settle.
* **Use walking to reflect.** Think. Plan. Or just wander. This is your moving meditation.

### ✅ End Goal:

> A stronger body, a clearer mind, and a habit that pushes you forward.
> With every meter, you’re building discipline, endurance, and momentum.
> You’re not just walking — *you’re leveling up*.
